publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-812# Andrew Wilson: Army Uniform Contract—That the Parliament expresses concern over the decision by the Ministry of Defence (MoD) to award a contract for the supply of army uniforms to foreign firms rather than the Cumbernauld based firm, Edward MacBean; notes the quality record of Edward MacBean, and invites the MoD to support Scottish jobs and the Scottish manufacturing industry by reversing its decision. Supported by: Linda Fabiani*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Colin Campbell*, Alex Neil*
S1M-812# Army Uniform Contract (lodged on 5 May 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-812# Army Uniform Contract (lodged on 5 May 2000) Kay Ullrich*, Shona Robison*
S1M-812# Army Uniform Contract (lodged on 5 May 2000) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-812# Army Uniform Contract (lodged on 5 May 2000) Donald Gorrie*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*

S1M-812# Andrew Wilson: Army Uniform Contract-That the Parliament expresses concern over the decision by the Ministry of Defence (MoD) to award a contract for the supply of army uniforms to foreign firms rather than the Cumbernauld based firm, Edward MacBean; notes the quality record of Edward MacBean, and invites the MoD to support Scottish jobs and the Scottish manufacturing industry by reversing its decision. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Nicola Sturgeon, Roseanna Cunningham, Colin Campbell, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Kay Ullrich, Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Donald Gorrie, Richard Lochhead, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Adam Ingram*

Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Nicola Sturgeon, Roseanna Cunningham, Colin Campbell, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Kay Ullrich, Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Donald Gorrie, Richard Lochhead, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Adam Ingram, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton
